articles.description: Udaipur News: मृतक के बेटे ने बताया कि जब वह बहुत छोटा था तो उसकी मां उसे छोड़कर किसी दूसरे शख्स के साथ चली गई थी। जिसके बाद खेमराज कुछ दिनों तक शादी नहीं की। उसके बाद उसने तीन महीने में ही एक-एक कर तीन शादियां की। इनमें से दो बीवियां दूसरे मर्दों के साथ भाग …

articles.title: चैंपियंस ट्रॉफी, वर्ल्ड कप और अब लॉर्ड्स वाली हार, आग का जवाब अंगारों से कब देना सीखेंगे हमारे बैट्समैन
articles.description: Indian Cricket Team: भारतीय क्रिकेट टीम के बल्लेबाज मुश्किल समय पर पिच पर नहीं टिक पा रहे हैं। चाहे वह 2017 चैंपियंस ट्रॉफी का फाइनल हो या 2019 वर्ल्ड कप का सेमीफाइनल। अब लॉर्ड्स वनडे में भी टीम की यही स्थिति हुई। टॉप ऑर्डर फेल हुआ और पूरी टीम बिखर गई।

articles.title: Madhya Pradesh man gives supari to bahu to kill his wife
articles.description: India News: BHOPAL: This may be the first alleged ‘supari’ to a bahu to kill her ‘saas’.

articles.author: Prafulla Marpakwar
articles.title: Maharashtra govt gives Rs 15 crore to rebel Shiv Sena MLA Abdul Sattar's mill
articles.description: High-profile Shiv Sena rebel Abdul Sattar is the first MLA beneficiary of the new government led by Eknath Shinde. As per an order uploaded on state government's website, the state on July 13 has sanctioned Rs 15.17 crore for Sillod-based National Cooperative…

articles.author: Swati Deshpande
articles.title: Are all NDPS offences non-bailable? Larger Bombay HC bench to examine
articles.description: A Bombay high court bench of Justice Bharati Dangre recently referred to a larger bench the question whether all offences under the Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances (NDPS) Act are non- bailable, irrespective of many not warranting imprisonment.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Karnataka government's U-turn on banning pictures, videos in its offices
articles.description: After drawing flak from various quarters, the state government withdrew the order banning photography and videography inside government offices, just about 12 hours after it was issued. It follows directions from CM Basavaraj Bommai late Friday night.

articles.author: Niranjan Kaggere
articles.title: Curd, lassi pouches to cost Rs 2-3 more
articles.description: The prices of curd, lassi and buttermilk are set to shoot up by Rs 2-3 starting Monday, following the GST council's recent decision to levy 5% tax on packaged dairy products and other food items.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Eknath Shinde government re-approves renaming of Aurangabad and Osmanabad
articles.description: Shinde said the proposal to rename Aurangabad as Sambhajinagar, Osmanabad as Dharashiv, and the Navi Mumbai international airport after D B Patil has been okayed by a cabinet that has the backing of 162-164 MLAs.
